    • numberInputEvent

      private final javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> numberInputEvent
      This EventHandler will check which numeric-button has been clicked and forwards this information to handleNumberInput for checking whether or not that input is false.

  • Method Details

    • getSecretCode

      public java.lang.String getSecretCode()

    • setLightColor

      private void setLightColor​(java.lang.String color)

    • setButtonPictures

      private void setButtonPictures()
      If the button contains a number that has been generated in the secretCode, then the button will recieve a picture that implies that it is included in the code.

    • addKeypadListener

      private void addKeypadListener()
      Add MouseClickListener to Number Buttons, DEL Button and AC Button with their corresponding EventHandler.

    • removeKeypadListener

      private void removeKeypadListener()

    • handleNumberInput

      private void handleNumberInput​(java.lang.String buttonText)
      This method handles the input given from the player. It adds the input to the textarea as a display and checks whether or not the numeric character input is equal to the secretCode that has been generated. true = green light, false = red light.
      Parameters:
      buttonText - number that the clicked button represents.

    • deleteLastInput

      private void deleteLastInput()
      This method deletes the last input that has been recieved from the player. The light will be set to default grey.

    • playerHasFailed

      private void playerHasFailed()
      This method is informing the player for their failure and turns the input red. The light will be set to red aswell.

    • randomize

      public void randomize()
      This method randomizes the secretCode each time the minigame is being opened. The secretCode will never include the same number more than twice.

    • reset

      public void reset()

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
